-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Morse code
--   
--   Morse code
@package MorseCode
@version 0.0.5

module Text.Morse

-- | Convert String to Morse Code. And ignore invalid Morse character.
encodeMorse :: String -> String

-- | Get string from Morse Code. Invalid Morse Code will skip.
decodeMorse :: String -> String

-- | Character can encode to Morse Code?
canEncodeToMorse :: Char -> Bool

-- | Is valid Morse character.?
isMorseChar :: Char -> Bool
